name: The Doctor Will See You Now (Alice Casey)
name_original: The Doctor Will See You Now (Alice Casey)
description:
It's taken a year to get to this point. You've seen doctors in half a dozen different cities. You've travelled more hours by train than you can count. This is the final hurdle. The surgeon won't see you until you get approval from all those doctors.

Controls:

WASD to move

Click to interact with objects

Acknoledgements:

"Binary" dithering shader by Keijiro Takahashi : https://github.com/keijiro/KinoBinary
